channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Speeding from Chadwick Road to Grove Park, 26th June
item.description:
Multiple incidents of excessive speeding up the road, in excess of 50mph this is a huge danger on our street and putting many of street residents and neighbours at risk.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 30, Grove Park, Peckham, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Deep potholes along 400–500 meters of the bus lane, 26th June
item.description:
There are deep potholes stretching over 400–500 meters of the bus lane. Every time a large vehicle passes, the 20 flats at Tait House shake severely, causing damage to the building’s structure and increasing risks to both safety and property. This situation also puts drivers and passengers at risk. It is urgent that this issue is addressed without delay.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Junction Road, Archway, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Street lamp out, 26th June
item.description:
Two street lamps at the roundabout on west street leading to Chichester Wharf development are permanently out Please fix

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Chichester Wharf, Northumberland Heath, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dying hanging baskets, 26th June
item.description:
The lovely hanging baskets are so dry they are dying. I know its been hot but what were lovely floral baskets are now nearly dead.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 55, Mottingham Road, Mottingham, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly tip again, 26th June
item.description:
Please can the council get a grip on this notorious slum site where fly tips are daily and stink in the heat

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Dunsmure Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Private sewage drain, 26th June
item.description:
The private sewage drain at 23 Derry Downs is overflowing on their property and running over the pavements outside the property. This is now smelling putrid and nothing is being done to stop the sewage on the public street. This is an urgent health hazard.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 23, Derry Downs, Poverest, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Rubbish build up in rear garden, 26th June
item.description:
There's rubbish, waste and dumped furniture in the back garden of a property on Brookhill Road. This garden is open to the street. It has been like it for at least a year and more rubbish is being added. It will become a breeding ground for rodents.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Brookhill Road, London
Report on FixMyStreet
